education.institution: Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology, Pune
Rajiv Gandhi Academy of E-Learning, Pune

projects.name: AI Models for Predicting Diabetes Risk
projects.description: Analysed machine learning algorithms like K Nearest Neighbors (KNN), Random Forest, and Decision Tree to predict diabetes risk. Presented in ICML 2023 conference.

projects.name: Task Management System
projects.description: Resolved the problem of managing tasks in the corporate world by creating a backend using XAMP and PHPMYADMIN, and a frontend using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.

projects.name: Blockchain for Secure Digital Voting
projects.description: Reviewed various blockchain-based copyright protection platforms, investigated the role of smart contracts, and analysed legal and regulatory challenges associated with blockchain in art.
